author: jbellis
msg: split flusher executor into flushSorter and flushWriter.  This is because sorting is CPU-bound, and writing is disk-bound; we want to be able to do both at once.
patch by jbellis; reviewed by goffinet for CASSANDRA-401

author: jbellis
msg: clean up ThreadFactoryImpl and rename to NamedThreadFactory
patch by jbellis; reviewed by goffinet for CASSANDRA-401

author: jbellis
msg: r/m unused commitlogcontext arg to flush. synchronize getTempSSTablePath
patch by jbellis; reviewed by goffinet for CASSANDRA-401

author: jbellis
msg: clean out unused code from MessagingService. Inline sink processing into sendOneWay instead of having another executor for that.
this sets the stage for backpressuring the client, should we choose to do that
patch by jbellis; reviewed by goffinet for CASSANDRA-401
